author.about: Hobby photographer and web developer. Love to take pictures of birds, nature and motorsport.

home.content: A photo gallery template with stock photos provided from Pexels. Add or remove images from the grid and customize your own image gallery!

gallery.content: A collection of images from John Smith's gallery.

about.content: A page about John Smith, and photography. This template is currently the default version so add your own about me page info here.
